Sentencas: Using the classical Monte Carlo method and density functional theory (DFT) calculations, various stable adsorption configurations for the Ni/yttria- stabilized zirconia anode ( Ni/YSZ) were predicted.
Titulo: First-Principles Study on the Microstructure of Triple-Phase Boundaries in the Ni/Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Anode

Sentencas: Compared with previously reported results, more stable triple phase boundary structures were found.
Titulo: First-Principles Study on the Microstructure of Triple-Phase Boundaries in the Ni/Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Anode

Sentencas: Based on these optimized configurations, charge transfer is discussed in detail, as O ion migration occurs where electron transfer from YSZ to Ni is important in describing the electrochemical reaction at the anodes of the solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: First-Principles Study on the Microstructure of Triple-Phase Boundaries in the Ni/Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Anode

Sentencas: We thus analyzed the possible factors that affect the degree of electron transfer.
Titulo: First-Principles Study on the Microstructure of Triple-Phase Boundaries in the Ni/Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Anode

Sentencas: The results indicate that a new electrochemical mechanism is at work in the Ni/YSZ system.
Titulo: First-Principles Study on the Microstructure of Triple-Phase Boundaries in the Ni/Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Anode
